info.name: Boxed in dashboard
info.description: Displays courses as boxes. The style uses fixed width and is optimized for my widescreen monitor, so it might not be suitable for screens with smaller resolution.
info.additionalInfo:
11. july - edited to fit the recent changes.
11. july - edited to fit the even more recent changes.
28. august - scaled down the new leaderboard and premium sidebars, adjusted the button size to fit in the new speed review button, adjusted spacing between boxes
2. september - fitted in the audio review button, removed the star from the difficult words button, made ready for review button stick out
18. september - undid the white-space nowrap (it prevented the number of items to review going into the second row), aligned the edit goal button
